import React, {useEffect, useState} from "react"; import {Button, Card, Col, Container, Form, InputGroup, Row, Table} from "react-bootstrap"; import {useDispatch, useSelector} from "react-redux"; import {getRouteStations} from "../redux/apiMobileV2/ApiMobileV2Action"; function RouteValueStations() { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const id = useSelector(state => state.apiMobileV2Reducer.routeId); useEffect(() => { dispatch(getRouteStations(id)); }, []); const data = useSelector(state => state.apiMobileV2Reducer.routeStationsData); const [status, setStatus] = useState(true); const kpp1 = data.kpp1; const kpp2 = data.kpp2; return ( <>
